hero.headline: Transforming Data Into Insights
hero.subtitle: I architect intelligent data solutions that drive business growth through advanced analytics, database optimization, and compelling visualizations.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about turning complex data challenges into elegant solutions
paragraphs: As a results-driven Computer Science graduate from JIS College of Engineering, I am passionate about transforming complex data into strategic business intelligence. I specialize in the full data lifecycle, from designing and optimizing robust PostgreSQL databases to developing predictive machine learning models using Python (Pandas, Scikit-learn) for tasks like customer segmentation. I excel at bringing these insights to life through insightful, interactive Power BI dashboards that track critical KPIs and empower stakeholders with clear, accessible data stories.

With a proven track record of creating significant business impact, I have successfully delivered solutions that reduced manual analysis time by 75%, thereby accelerating decision-making and enabling a greater focus on strategic organizational growth.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: Comprehensive toolkit for modern data challenges

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Real-world solutions that drive business impact

items.title: Sales Performance Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Comprehensive sales analytics solution featuring 20+ interactive visualizations and automated reporting processes, transforming raw business data into actionable insights.
highlights: Integrated multiple data sources with complex transformations
Built dynamic dashboards with trend analysis and geographic mapping
Established robust data relationships using DAX

items.title: Digital Music Store Data Analysis
items.description: Comprehensive exploratory data analysis on a digital music store database using advanced SQL techniques to uncover business insights.
highlights: Solved 10+ complex analytical problems using advanced SQL
Applied subqueries, CTEs, and window functions for deep insights
Identified customer purchasing patterns and seasonal trends

items.title: E-commerce Customer Segmentation Analysis
items.tech: Python | Scikit-learn | Data Analysis & Machine Learning
items.description: Developed a comprehensive Python application for e-commerce sales analysis, leveraging data modeling for customer segmentation.
highlights: Engineered an RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) model and implemented K-Means clustering to partition the customer base into distinct profiles.
Wrote optimized Pandas scripts with data aggregation and transformation functions to conduct exploratory data analysis and uncover sales trends.
Designed a profiling system that translated cluster data into actionable marketing strategies, enabling personalized engagement for each customer segment.

items.title: Student Attendance Management System
items.description: Robust PostgreSQL database application for academic attendance tracking with comprehensive data management and real-time reporting capabilities.
highlights: Created normalized PostgreSQL schema with relational integrity
Wrote optimized SQL queries with JOIN clauses for reports
Designed time-based reporting with flexible date range filtering

contact.title: Ready to Collaborate?
contact.subtitle: Transform your data challenges into growth opportunities. Let's discuss how I can help your organization unlock the power of analytics.
